duties_responsibilities.duty: Review accounting transactions for accuracy and completeness.
Perform general ledger maintenance and account reconciliations, including bank accounts.
Prepare documents and post month-end general ledger journal entries.
Provide support for Accounts Payable (AP) and Accounts Receivable (AR) functions as required.
Prepare, manage, and coordinate annual audit with outside auditors and departments under the Assistant Controller's supervision.
Review and approve weekly payment batches.
Review Analysis of all balance sheet accounts and various expense accounts on a regular basis.
Coordinate with the Assistant Controller financial audits and be involved in preparations as required.
Collaborate on inventory reconciliation and adjustments on book as necessary.
Review and track capital spending reports with the aid of the Fixed Asset System.
Ensure that monthly and year-end closings are concluded in a timely manner.
Participate and contribute to software projects as a project team member, for example, ERP system.
Perform all duties in accordance with environmental, food safety, safety rules, and regulations.
